title: Welcome To The Articfial Intelligence Trust Council
text: AITC is a nostr client that focuses on empowering its users by providing them with greater privacy and clarity. By using AITC, users can take control of their personal information and ensure that their data is kept safe and secure. The goal of AITC is to give users back the power that they deserve when it comes to their own information, and to create a more transparent and trustworthy online environment.
